weekly_top_story.headline: Indonesia and the European Union Sign Landmark Free Trade Agreement in Bali
weekly_top_story.summary: After over nine years of negotiations, Indonesia and the EU finalized a free trade agreement removing tariffs and opening investments, significantly impacting global trade dynamics and economic relations.

stories.headline: Typhoon Ragasa Causes Deadly Flooding in Taiwan and Disrupts Hong Kong Airport Operations
stories.summary: Typhoon Ragasa led to at least 14 deaths and 124 missing in Taiwan due to a barrier lake burst, while Hong Kong International Airport suspended all passenger flights for 36 hours, highlighting severe regional weather impacts.

stories.headline: Lithuania Authorizes Military to Shoot Down Unauthorized Drones Amid Russian Incursion Concerns
stories.summary: In response to recent unauthorized drone incursions linked to the Russia-Ukraine conflict, Lithuania's parliament now permits the military to shoot down any unauthorized drones entering its airspace to protect national security.
